comparison.description: Determines how the Y position of the block should be compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: Determines how the Y position of the block should be compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: The value at which the Y position of the block will be compared to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: The value at which the Y position of the block will be compared to.

type.description:
## Height

---


[Block Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_condition_types/height)

Compares the Y position of the block to a value.

Type ID: `origins:height`

---

### Examples

```json
"block_condition": {
    "type": "origins:height",
    "comparison": "<=",
    "compare_to": 11
}
```

This example will check if the block is within Y=11 or lower.
